alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 7:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater and northern Jefferson Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 729 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Helena, or 9 miles east of Helena, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City and York. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 188 and 189. Highway 12 between mile markers 48 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
